      Event addEvent(java.lang.String addEventForm)

      java.lang.String FOOO(java.lang.String search)
      semantic tagging related, returns exactly what wikidata would return
      EventDetail getEventDetails(java.lang.String eventId)
      returns the extended version of Event, opens up all other sub objects and gives their details as well

      lists all events in the database with small extension of Event class

      lists all events created by a specific user
      java.util.List<Event> listEventsParticipated(java.lang.String token)
      lists all the events that a user attends
